1: Praise the Lord. Praise God in his holy temple. Praise him in his mighty heavens.
2: Praise him for his powerful acts. Praise him because he is greater than anything else.
3: Praise him by blowing trumpets. Praise him with harps and lyres.
4: Praise him with tambourines and dancing. Praise him with stringed instruments and flutes.
5: Praise him with clashing cymbals. Praise him with clanging cymbals.
6: Let everything that has breath praise the Lord. Praise the Lord.
